preparation_of_cathode_electrodes.solvent_mixture: 960 μL of ethanol and 80 μL of Nafion D-521 (5 wt%)

characterizations.PXRD: matches well with the simulated PXRD
characterizations.SEM: FEI Quanta 250 field emission scanning electron microscope (SEM) at an accelerating voltage of 10 kV
characterizations.HAADF-STEM: JEOL ARM2000 microscope with 200 kV accelerating voltage
characterizations.ICP-AES: Optima 5300DV plasma ion spectrum mass spectrometer
characterizations.XPS: PHI 5000 VersaProbe X-ray photoelectron spectrometer using standard and monochromatic Al Kα radiation
characterizations.EPR: Bruker EMX-10/12 at 90 K with a frequency of 9.4451 GHz at 298 K

characterizations.PXRD: matches well with the simulated PXRD
